definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
(onom.) breaking or snapping/(coll.) cut it out/stop it/also written 喀嚓[ka1 cha1]

sentences.english: Her shoes clicked against the floor as she walked.
sentences.chinese: 她走动时，鞋在地板上咔噔咔噔作响。

sentences.english: Her shoes clicked against the floor as she walked.

sentences.english: Don't know where thump of breeze, Mao ground in the door an claps ascend.
sentences.chinese: 不知哪里吹来的风，门咔地一声拍上了。

sentences.english: Youngblood's hand goes to his holster. The tower guards CLICK-CLACK their rifle bolts.
sentences.chinese: 杨伯拉德的手伸向枪套，哨兵也“咔啦”拉上枪栓。

sentences.english: Art shook his head, the side of the quake Why do all this reform and then exacting.
sentences.chinese: 大侠摇头，那边的咔咔咋都那么苛碜呢。

sentences.english: Art shook his head, the side of the quake Why do all this reform and then exacting.

sentences.english: Then the engine started coughing and spluttering.
sentences.chinese: 然后，引擎开始发出咔咔和噼啪的声音。

sentences.english: A tractor rattles across a field in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 远处，一辆拖拉机“咔咔”的驶过农田。

sentences.english: A tractor rattles across a field in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 远处，一辆拖拉机“咔咔”的驶过农田。

sentences.english: What a horrible creaking of the joints.
sentences.chinese: 关节发出可怕的咔咔声。

sentences.english: The tree cracked loudly and fell.
sentences.chinese: 那棵树发出咔的一声巨响断裂倒下了。

sentences.english: Also some fried burnt, ate withered.
sentences.chinese: 还有的炒焦了，吃起来咔枯咔枯的。

sentences.english: Along the waters edge ice crystals GREw, and listening closely, we heard the crack of freezing.
sentences.chinese: 水边正在结冰，细听之下，有结冻的“咔咔”声。
